H0.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. Sam Allardyce

H1.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. David Moyes

H2.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. Tony Pulis

H3.text: Who became head coach of Sunderland in March 2015. Dick Advocaat

A4.text: In March 2015 Poyet was sacked, and veteran Dutchman Dick Advocaat was appointed, saving the club from relegation.
